detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Fitted dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Fancy dress all-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and hood with sewn-on ears and appliqués. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems, and a detachable tail with a hook and loop fastening.

Small bag in glittery imitation leather with a narrow cord shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Flap with a hook and loop fastening and heart-shaped pendant at the side. Lined. Size approx. 5x8.5x13.5 cm.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Short, crushed velvet skirt with an elasticated waist and seam with a bell-shaped lower section. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleat at the front and a double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Long dress in mesh with a round neckline, long sleeves and concealed elastication down the front and sleeves for a draped look. Lined.

Checked suit trousers in soft, brushed fabric with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.

Fitted, calf-length dress in stretch jersey with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a gathered seam at the top, and pleats on one shoulder and at one side to create a draped effect at the front. Seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined over the bust.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Hi-tops in mesh with a scuba shaft with reflective details, lacing at the front, hook and loop fastener at one side. Fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Scarf in a soft knit. Size 50x170 cm.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour mesh panels down the sides of the legs. Reflective details.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Shorter, boxy-style top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and a contrasting colour trim around the neckline.
Backpack in a patterned weave with a handle and zip at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment. Size 10x25x35 cm.
Jacket in stretch imitation suede with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, buttons at the front, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mixed mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and an imitation suede flap with a fastener. One inner compartment and one outer compartment with a zip. Lined. Height 18 cm. Width 23 cm.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.3 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. One top has a print motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Body in stretch lace with a crocheted look. Jersey-lined cups with a scalloped trim, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Slightly shorter, gently fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a soft, brushed finish.
Knee-high boots with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Soft pile pyjamas. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with embroidery at the top and seams at the front with wide, gathered flounces that fall over the shoulders. Opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and a flared, airy skirt.
Boots with warm faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Soft plastic smartphone case.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.

Dungarees in soft velour and a long-sleeved bodysuit in patterned jersey. Dungarees with an elasticated waist and straps with buttons at the front. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. The cotton content of the dungarees and bodysuit is organic.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties at the side. Long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum.
Fully lined, textured swimsuit with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed elastication under the bust and a low-cut back.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with a frilled collar. Deep opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and back. Long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seams creating tiers at the waist and hips. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short necklace with asymmetric plastic beads. Adjustable length 37-45 cm.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back that has a rubber print and ventilating hole pattern.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Tunic in an airy cotton weave with embroidery at the front. Small, pompom-trimmed stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front with narrow ties at the top and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips with a pompom trim and a lined, flared tier to the hem.
Metal double-hoop earrings. Total length 8.5 cm.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a round neck, dropped shoulders, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Fitted top in jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.4 cm to 1.4 cm.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a wide neckline, long sleeves with rows of fringing and elasticated ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a wide ribbed hem.
Fitted jacket in twill made from a sturdy wool blend with narrow notch lapels and two buttons at the front. Flap front pockets, an inner pocket with a button, and a single back vent. Lined.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Shirt with a rounded collar, buttons down the front and piping in a contrasting colour. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and chiffon appliqué on the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved jersey nightdress with a print motif on the front.
Dress with a slub cotton jersey bodice and woven skirt. Print motif at the top, short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam and bow at the waist and patch front pockets.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a modal and cotton blend with a wide neckline and seam at the waist with a drawstring. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in mesh with press-studs down the front and a print motif on the chest.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft slub cotton jersey with broderie anglaise at the front, frills that continue over the shoulders and press-studs at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with smocked hems.
Scarf in patterned satin made from recycled polyester.
Set with a sleeveless dress and a top in soft jersey. A-line dress with narrow shoulder straps. Top with short, overlocked sleeves.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey.
Cropped top in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and deep V-neck with gathers at the front. Concealed zip in one side.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top and ankle.
Vest tops in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a chest pocket and press-stud on one shoulder.
Trousers in a softly draping weave with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.

Blouse in a soft cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Narrow, detachable ties under the bust, 3/4-length raglan sleeves, narrow cuffs with ties, and a rounded hem.
